twoSetSkill.name: Combat Sync 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: When Charged ATKs hit, if there is no more than one enemy within 8m, host deals 45.0% bonus Total DMG for 6s.

threeSetSkill.name: Battle-tested 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Charged ATKs deal 200.0% ATK of bonus Physical DMG. CD: 6s. Asuka equip bonus: Charged ATKs deal 40.0% bonus Physical DMG and in enhanced form, the CD drops to 3s.
